projectName: 新发传染病监测管理系统 (Emerging Infectious Disease Surveillance System)

features.featureName: 疾病编码管理 (Disease Code Management)
features.description: Enable CRUD operations for quarantine infectious disease codes, including import/export capabilities and mapping to DHIS2 OptionSets
features.businessValue: Foundation metadata for all case management operations

features.featureName: 病原微生物目录管理 (Pathogen Catalog Management)
features.description: Manage pathogen microorganism catalog with CRUD operations, type classification (virus/bacteria), and disease-pathogen mapping through OptionGroups
features.businessValue: Essential for laboratory test result mapping and epidemiological analysis

features.featureName: 预警消息推送 (Alert Notification Push)
features.description: Push alert messages to emergency command system when predefined thresholds are met (case clusters, abnormal symptoms, new diseases)
relatedMetadata: State Machine: SM-2.1 (Alert Event Status Flow)

features.featureName: 个案调查管理 (Case Investigation Management)
features.description: Manage case investigation forms including epidemiological data (exposure history, contact history, travel history), status transitions, and push to epidemiological investigation system
relatedMetadata: DataElements: DeInitDiag1, DeConfDiag1, DeCaseStat1, DeExposHst1, DeContHst01, DeTravHst01
features.businessValue: Core case management and epidemiological data collection

features.featureName: 随访记录管理 (Follow-up Record Management)
features.description: Record and manage multiple follow-up visits with health status tracking, temperature monitoring, treatment compliance, and automated status updates (e.g., death triggers case closure)
relatedMetadata: DataElements: DeFlwUpMthd, DeHlthStat1, DeTemp00001, DeSymptoms1, DeTrtCompl1, DeNxtFlwDt1
ProgramRules: PR1.2a (Death status handling), PR2.3 (Temperature validation)
features.businessValue: Continuous monitoring of patient health status

features.featureName: 治疗记录管理 (Treatment Record Management)
features.description: Manage treatment records including treatment type, hospital/department, diagnosis, treatment plan, medications, and outcome tracking with automatic case closure on death
relatedMetadata: DataElements: DeTrtType01, DeHospNm001, DeDeptNm001, DeDocNm0001, DeDiagnos01, DeTrtPlan01, DeMedicat01, DeTrtOutcm1, DeDiscDt001
ProgramRules: PR1.2b (Treatment death handling), PR4.2 (Discharge date validation)
features.businessValue: Clinical treatment tracking and outcome management

features.featureName: 检测记录管理 (Laboratory Test Management)
features.description: Manage laboratory test records with sample collection, test types, results, pathogen detection, and push to laboratory system. Includes auto-generated test numbers and status confirmation workflow
relatedMetadata: DataElements: DeTestNo001, DeSmplColDt, DeSmplType1, DeTestType1, DeTestOrg01, DeTestDt001, DeTestRslt1, DeRsltDtl01, DePathogen1, DeTestStat1, DePushLab01
ProgramRules: PR5.2 (Push to lab button), P7MandPath1 (Pathogen mandatory for positive results)

features.featureName: 追踪记录管理 (Epidemiological Tracking Management)
features.description: Track travel history, contact history, item/place exposure with geographic data, risk assessment, and push to epidemiological investigation system. Includes map visualization of movement trajectories
relatedMetadata: DataElements: DeTrackTp01, DeStartDt01, DeEndDt0001, DeLocDesc01, DeRelRgn001, DeContPrsn1, DeExpDtl001, DeRiskAsmt1, DeTrkPshEpi
ProgramRules: PR4.3 (Date range validation), P14WrnHiRsk (High risk warning)
features.businessValue: Contact tracing and exposure mapping for outbreak control

features.featureName: 不明原因病例登记 (Unknown Disease Case Registration)
features.description: Register cases with unknown etiology including clinical symptoms, suspected pathogen, and status management (pending test, testing, confirmed, excluded)
relatedMetadata: State Machine: SM-1.2 (Unknown Case Status Flow)
features.businessValue: Early detection system for emerging infectious diseases

features.featureName: 病例信息推送 (Case Information Push)
features.description: Push confirmed unknown disease cases to case management program (UC04), including automatic enrollment creation, test record copying, and multi-system notification (emergency, epidemiology)
features.businessValue: Seamless transition from unknown to known disease management

features.featureName: 不明病例检测管理 (Unknown Case Laboratory Test)
features.description: Manage laboratory tests for unknown disease cases with pathogen confirmation, disease name mapping, and automatic status updates triggering case push workflow
relatedMetadata: DataElements: DeUnkTstNo1, DeUnkSmplDt, DeUnkSmplTp, DeUnkTstTp1, DeUnkTstRst, DeConfPath1, DeConfDis01, DeUnkTstSt1
ProgramRules: PR7.2 (Confirmed status update), P21MndDisNm (Disease name mandatory)

features.featureName: 移动轨迹展示 (Movement Trajectory Visualization)
features.description: Display patient movement trajectories on map with timeline, location details, duration, and risk assessment based on tracking records

features.featureName: 疾病统计可视化 (Disease Statistics Visualization)
features.description: Visualize disease statistics with charts (line, bar, pie), trend analysis by date/region, and data table display with export capabilities
features.businessValue: Epidemic trend monitoring and decision support

features.featureName: 病原微生物统计 (Pathogen Statistics)
features.description: Statistical analysis of pathogens by type and geographic distribution with chart switching and trend analysis

features.featureName: 统计数据通用查询 (Generic Statistical Query)
features.description: Provide flexible query interface for statistical data with date range, region, disease type filters and multiple aggregation dimensions

features.featureName: 统计结果导出 (Statistical Report Export)
features.description: Export statistical results in multiple formats (Excel, PDF, CSV) with configurable content (summary, detail, charts) and export history management

features.featureName: 单点登录认证 (SSO Authentication)
features.description: Integrate with SSO portal for unified authentication across CDC portal systems

features.featureName: 数据共享对接 (Data Hub Integration)
features.description: Bi-directional data exchange with central data hub for cross-system data sharing

features.featureName: 系统配置管理 (System Configuration Management)
features.description: Manage system-wide configurations including basic settings, permission settings, interface settings, and notification settings

features.featureName: 接口监控维护 (Interface Monitoring)
features.description: Monitor and maintain external system interfaces with real-time status display, success rate tracking, response time monitoring, and call log management

features.featureName: 用户管理 (User Management)
features.description: Manage system users with CRUD operations, role assignment, organization unit assignment, and user group management

features.featureName: 组织单位层级管理 (Organisation Unit Hierarchy)
features.description: Manage 3-level organisation unit hierarchy (Province-City-County) with CDC type classification
features.businessValue: Geographic-based data segmentation and access control

features.featureName: 预警规则引擎 (Alert Rule Engine)
features.description: Background service to detect alert conditions (case clusters, abnormal symptom patterns, new disease emergence) and generate alert events

features.featureName: 预警处理工作流 (Alert Handling Workflow)
features.description: Manage alert lifecycle from pending to closed with investigation task creation, false alarm marking, and report export

features.featureName: Tracker搜索与列表 (Tracker Search & List)
features.description: Search and list tracked entities, enrollments, events with advanced filtering, sorting, pagination, and multi-criteria search
relatedMetadata: UI: WF-4.2 (Case list), WF-4.5 (Unknown case list)

features.featureName: 程序规则引擎集成 (Program Rules Engine)
features.description: Execute DHIS2 program rules for field visibility, mandatory fields, data validation, calculated values, and side effects (notifications)
relatedMetadata: ProgramRules: All PR* rules in metadata

features.featureName: 数据导入导出 (Data Import/Export)
features.description: Bulk import/export of tracker data via CSV/JSON with validation, error handling, and async job tracking

features.featureName: 关系管理 (Relationship Management)
features.description: Create and manage relationships between tracker objects (tracked entity-to-tracked entity, enrollment-to-enrollment, event-to-event)

features.featureName: Notes记录 (Notes Recording)
features.description: Add notes to enrollments and events for supplementary information logging with audit trail
relatedMetadata: UI: Notes section in detail pages

features.featureName: 工作台仪表板 (Dashboard Workbench)
features.description: Display key indicators, pending tasks, recent access, and quick action shortcuts on homepage

features.featureName: 移动端适配 (Mobile Responsive Design)
features.description: Responsive UI design for mobile devices with touch-friendly interactions and offline capability

features.featureName: 变更日志审计 (Change Log Auditing)
features.description: Track and display change history for tracked entity attributes and event data values
